blocks.description: The 'Application to Graduate' is a one time application process. Your graduation application will be reviewed after submitting via TruView. If you make changes after your application has been reviewed, please notify the Registrar's Office. In order for your degree to be awarded, all coursework must be successfully completed and all outstanding graduation requirements met. If your degree has been awarded please disregard. Has not applied to graduate
